author: Jim Rohn

quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
author: Michael Korda

quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: There's a way to do it better - find it.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: Poverty was the greatest motivating factor in my life.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: If you think you can do it, you can.
author: John Burroughs
category: You Can Do It, Think, You

quote: It is very important to know who you are. To make decisions. To show who you are.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow right ahead.
author: George Lucas

quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
author: Norman Ralph Augustine

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: I attribute my success to this - I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
author: George S. Patton

quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
author: Ted Turner

quote: Never complain and never explain.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Never give in and never give up.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
author: William Blake

quote: After a storm comes a calm.
author: Matthew Henry

quote: Always desire to learn something useful.
author: Sophocles

quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
author: Victor Kiam

quote: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: Follow your inner moonlight don't hide the madness.
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: It's always too early to quit.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.
author: George Whitefield

quote: One finds limits by pushing them.
author: Herbert Simon

quote: I've always tried to go a step past wherever people expected me to end up.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: I've worked too hard and too long to let anything stand in the way of my goals. I will not let my teammates down and I will not let myself down.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
author: Jessica Savitch

quote: Get action. Seize the moment. Man was never intended to become an oyster.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Wherever you are - be all there.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.
author: John Burroughs

quote: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.
author: Philip Emeagwali

quote: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl.
author: Benjamin Jowett

quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
author: Unknown

quote: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Don't think, just do.
author: Horace

quote: Don't fight the problem, decide it.
author: George C. Marshall

quote: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: There is always room at the top.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.
author: Diane Sawyer

quote: Who seeks shall find.
author: Sophocles

quote: If you don't ask, you don't get.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: The more things you do, the more you can do.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: A will finds a way.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: From my tribe I take nothing, I am the maker of my own fortune.
author: Tecumseh

quote: I am not a has-been. I am a will be.
author: Lauren Bacall

quote: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.
author: Emile Zola

quote: You create your opportunities by asking for them.
author: Shakti Gawain

quote: You have to make it happen.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: Step by step and the thing is done.
author: Charles Atlas

quote: The dog that trots about finds a bone.
author: Golda Meir

quote: I come to win.
author: Leo Durocher

quote: I was motivated to be different in part because I was different.
author: Donna Brazile

quote: He conquers who endures.
author: Persius

quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
author: William James

quote: Know or listen to those who know.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: When one must, one can.
author: Charlotte Whitton

quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Many are called but few get up.
author: Oliver Herford

quote: Either move or be moved.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: To begin, begin.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Set your sights high, the higher the better. Expect the most wonderful things to happen, not in the future but right now. Realize that nothing is too good. Allow absolutely nothing to hamper you or hold you up in any way.
author: Eileen Caddy

quote: The more we do, the more we can do.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: How do you know you're going to do something, untill you do it?
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: Deserve your dream.
author: Octavio Paz

quote: I really believe that everyone has a talent, ability, or skill that he can mine to support himself and to succeed in life.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Set yourself earnestly to see what you are made to do, and then set yourself earnestly to do it.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: To be wholly devoted to some intellectual exercise is to have succeeded in life.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: They can conquer who believe they can.
author: Virgil

quote: Earl Nightingale has inspired more people toward success and fortune than any other motivational speaker on the planet.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The wise does at once what the fool does at last.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: I like to put on hardcore when I have to clean my apartment, which I hate to do, but it's motivational. I like old heavy metal when I'm outside working on my car. Music has definite functions for me.
author: Peter Steele

quote: If you've got a talent, protect it.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.
author: Flip Wilson

quote: One may miss the mark by aiming too high as too low.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Do not weep do not wax indignant. Understand.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: You never know what motivates you.
author: Cicely Tyson

quote: My first book was called, 'Mountain, Get Out of My Way,' where I did an autobiographical sketch, if you will, looking back at myself and looking back at things in my life, and juxtaposing them against things that are happening in other people's lives and trying to be motivational.
author: Montel Williams

quote: Success is the only motivational factor that a boy with character needs.
author: Woody Hayes

quote: Oh, I would love to be a motivational speaker. I have pulled myself out of a million potholes, and I can see the potholes ahead of me. That doesn't mean that I could always do that so perfectly for my own life. I totally fall in potholes.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: One day, I got so disgusted that I sat down and wrote a list called 'Justin's list of things to do before he kicks the bucket.' I wrote it for myself and shortened it to 'Justin's Bucket List.' It was there on the wall, not as a story idea but as a motivational tool for myself, which actually ended up working pretty well.
author: Justin Zackham

quote: We need to accept that the commandments of God aren't just a long list of good ideas. They aren't 'life hacks' from an Internet blog or motivational quotes from a Pinterest board.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: I'm thrilled to continue my partnership with U by Kotex for Generation Know while helping to empower girls. I've always been a motivational resource for my younger sisters and hope I can positively impact and inspire other young girls too.
author: Khloe Kardashian

quote: I don't know what it's like to have a typical father figure. He's not the dad who's going to take me to the beach and go swimming, but he's such a motivational person.
author: Tiffany Trump

quote: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
author: Eliza Dushku

quote: I like motivational books, because I like the go-getting American spirit - your destiny is in your own hands, life is what you make it, don't accept your limitations, jump before you're pushed, leap before you look.
author: Louise Mensch

quote: There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!
author: Edgar Cayce

quote: Typically, if you reward something, you get more of it. You punish something, you get less of it. And our businesses have been built for the last 150 years very much on that kind of motivational scheme.
author: Daniel H. Pink

quote: As long as I'm not selling out the people that ride or die with me, I'm glad I'm not an MC. I'm a motivational speaker. I'm not that rapper dude.
author: Young Jeezy

quote: I believe that any type of education can be great, but an education about ourselves can create something wonderful. I am a comedian, but people have called me a motivational speaker. I don't really consider myself that at all.
author: Andy Andrews

quote: Giving back, doing motivational speeches and stuff like that, that's always made me feel good. If you repeatedly go out there, and you are the change that you want to see, then that's what you are.
author: Keke Palmer

quote: Marvin's Motivational Moments actually started as something that was actually therapeutic for me. I would sit up late at night after my wife passed trying to adjust to being alone.
author: Marvin Sapp

quote: I want to build a legacy at the WWE, but I definitely want to continue to grow the Bella Empire. I want it to go beyond the ring. I would love to be a motivational speaker.
author: Nikki Bella

quote: I was perceived to be a first- to third-rounder. I kind of had a tough junior year and fell to the fifth round. At that time, it was motivational.
author: Ryan Howard

quote: Give Obama a script he has made his own, and he is the motivational speaker to end all speakers. Tony Robbins cloned with Honest Abe.
author: Tina Brown

quote: I started doing motivational tours. I've seen all kinds of people, from the CEOs to the lowest executive, opening up to their fears. We don't introspect as much as we should.
author: Anupam Kher

quote: I'm a motivational speaker.
author: Young Jeezy

quote: My mother's wonderful. To me she's perfection.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: My mom has always been my support system. She taught me to never give up and to keep pursuing my passions no matter what.
author: Mandy Moore

quote: The natural state of motherhood is unselfishness. When you become a mother, you are no longer the center of your own universe. You relinquish that position to your children.
author: Jessica Lange

quote: That strong mother doesn't tell her cub, Son, stay weak so the wolves can get you. She says, Toughen up, this is reality we are living in.
author: Lauryn Hill

quote: My mother said to me, 'If you are a soldier, you will become a general. If you are a monk, you will become the Pope.' Instead, I was a painter, and became Picasso.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: My mother taught me to treat a lady respectfully.
author: Chris Brown

quote: Motherhood is the greatest thing and the hardest thing.
author: Ricki Lake

quote: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: My mom and I have always been there for each other. We had some tough times, but she was always there for me.
author: LeBron James

quote: My mom used to make my costumes when I was little; she sews a lot. One year, I was a bride and I had a big wedding dress and a bouquet. Another year I was a medieval princess with a long teal dress and a veil. It was a little extravagant, but it was cute!
author: Sasha Pieterse

quote: Having children is my greatest achievement. It was my saviour. It switched my focus from the outside to the inside. My children are gifts, they remind me of what's important.
author: Elle Macpherson

quote: My love for cooking began when I was young. Because my parents were in the army, they were both really busy. A lot of times I'd have to cook for the family; I'd rotate with my siblings. It started out as a chore, but as I got older, my mom started to see that I was really good at it. I became her sous chef.
author: Tia Mowry

quote: When you were growing up, your mom and dad told you to look both ways before crossing the street or not to get into a car with a stranger. It's the same with the Internet. We have a big responsibility and a huge role in bringing all the stakeholders to the table - users, parents, educators, law enforcement, government organisations.
author: Chris DeWolfe

quote: Only mothers can think of the future - because they give birth to it in their children.
author: Maxim Gorky

quote: Sending a handwritten letter is becoming such an anomaly. It's disappearing. My mom is the only one who still writes me letters. And there's something visceral about opening a letter - I see her on the page. I see her in her handwriting.
author: Steve Carell

quote: My mom took all of my behavior personally. Everything I did, she thought it was an act of rebellion against her. But it was just me being me.
author: Pink

quote: Sometimes when you are a great mom, you're not so great at your job. And then when you're good at your job, you're not so great of a mom or a good wife. It's a dance that never stops. But it's beautiful.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: You know, I don't think any mother aims to be a single mom. I didn't wish for that, but it happened.
author: Charlize Theron

quote: One thing my mom used to tell me was to look to the other side, and know that my present is not going to be everything. So if I'm having a bad day, she goes, 'Just imagine tomorrow. This is going to be over. This is going to be done with.'
author: Tyra Banks

quote: It's usually my mom who gets on me about my facial hair. I can't grow a good mustache, so I guess it's just a neck beard. I just have trouble growing up there.
author: Andrew Luck

quote: What is free time? I'm a single mother. My free moments are filled with loving my little girl.
author: Roma Downey

quote: When modeling agencies were saying that I was too big and gaining weight, my mom said, 'OK, we're going to discuss what they're saying over pizza, and we're going to plan the future of your career which doesn't involve you having to be skinny.'
author: Tyra Banks

quote: My mom used to get arrested for being with my dad. She would get fined. She would spend weekends in jail.
author: Trevor Noah

quote: I grew up in a working class family. People thought I might go work at a mill. My mom wanted me to learn how to lay carpet because she was concerned about my future. Nobody had high hopes for me. But I was a hustler.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Sweater, n.: garment worn by child when its mother is feeling chilly.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: My mother used to tell me man gives the award, God gives the reward. I don't need another plaque.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: Well I was eight years old, and I have an older cousin who is three years older than me and she was doing acting, commercials, and modeling at the time and... to see my cousin doing that was really inspiring and I wanted to do it. So I went to my mom and I asked her if I could do it, and for the acting part of it, she made me study for a year.
author: Hailee Steinfeld

quote: Tired mothers find that spanking takes less time than reasoning and penetrates sooner to the seat of the memory.
author: Will Durant

quote: The Vatican is against surrogate mothers. Good thing they didn't have that rule when Jesus was born.
author: Elayne Boosler

quote: When your mother asks, 'Do you want a piece of advice?' it is a mere formality. It doesn't matter if you answer yes or no. You're going to get it anyway.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: It is only in the act of nursing that a woman realizes her motherhood in visible and tangible fashion it is a joy of every moment.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Clearly, society has a tremendous stake in insisting on a woman's natural fitness for the career of mother: the alternatives are all too expensive.
author: Ann Oakley

quote: Motherhood is the only thing in my life that I've really known for sure is something I wanted to do.
author: Cynthia Nixon

quote: I am blessed to have Mom and Dad.
author: Kevin Eubanks
category: Blessed, I Am, I Am Blessed

quote: I'm very close with my family, so my mom is part of my entourage.
author: Kid Cudi

quote: I didn't plan on being a single mom, but you have to deal with the cards you are dealt the best way you can.
author: Tichina Arnold

quote: A guy is a lump like a doughnut. So, first you gotta get rid of all the stuff his mom did to him. And then you gotta get rid of all that macho crap that they pick up from beer commercials. And then there's my personal favorite, the male ego.
author: Roseanne Barr

quote: My Mom said she learned how to swim when someone took her out in the lake and threw her off the boat. I said, 'Mom, they weren't trying to teach you how to swim.'
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: My mom used to say that I became a fighter and a scrapper and a tough guy to protect who I am at my core.
author: Vin Diesel

quote: Morality and its victim, the mother - what a terrible picture! Is there indeed anything more terrible, more criminal, than our glorified sacred function of motherhood?
author: Emma Goldman

quote: Throughout my life, my mom has been the person that I've always looked up to.
author: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: We need somebody who's got the heart, the empathy, to recognize what it's like to be a young teenage mom, the empathy to understand what it's like to be poor or African-American or gay or disabled or old - and that's the criterion by which I'll be selecting my judges.
author: Barack Obama

quote: I don't think I would have been able to stick with it and been proud of who I am and be feminine out on the court. I think I would have folded to the peer pressure if I didn't have my mom to encourage me to be me and be proud of how tall I am.
author: Lisa Leslie

quote: I do work too hard sometimes, but my mom is such an inspiration. She tells me to 'chill out' and not take things so seriously. She will say: 'Go and have a massage.'
author: Josh Peck

quote: I just live life. I grew up in a Christian family, but, you know, the way Mom brought me up is to, you know, do you, to always be yourself.
author: Tyler, The Creator

quote: My mom raised me to be clean, so it's in my nature. I have two little girls, and I'm married, but we've got a nanny and a maid.
author: Vanilla Ice

quote: As I have gotten older, I am more of an independent woman, and my mom and I have our own lives, but we are still best friends and can be there for each other.
author: Amanda Fuller

quote: Yes, Mother. I can see you are flawed. You have not hidden it. That is your greatest gift to me.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Of all the roles I've played, none has been as fulfilling as being a mother.
author: Annette Funicello

quote: When you have a good mother and no father, God kind of sits in. It's not enough, but it helps.
author: Dick Gregory

quote: It is not until you become a mother that your judgment slowly turns to compassion and understanding.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Do you know what you call those who use towels and never wash them, eat meals and never do the dishes, sit in rooms they never clean, and are entertained till they drop? If you have just answered, 'A house guest,' you're wrong because I have just described my kids.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: An ounce of mother is worth a pound of clergy.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: When motherhood becomes the fruit of a deep yearning, not the result of ignorance or accident, its children will become the foundation of a new race.
author: Margaret Sanger

quote: I was always going to church with my mom, dad and sister. I was literally raised under the godly influence both at home and church. There was no alcohol and no smoking at our house. That was the way a Bowden was supposed to live. My dad always told me to represent the Bowden name in a respectful manner.
author: Bobby Bowden

quote: I was labeled a troublemaker, my mom an unfit mother, and I was not welcome anywhere.
author: Ryan White

quote: My mom just wants to make sure that my heart is always in whatever I do and I'm in things for the right reasons.
author: Kevin Durant

quote: I love being a single mom. But it's definitely different when you're dating.
author: Brooke Burns

quote: I was a single mom that raised two bright, beautiful, and compassionate girls.
author: Connie Stevens

quote: When you are getting ready to become a mom, being in love with someone just isn't enough. You need to think about whether he would be a good parent and raise your children with similar beliefs.
author: Cindy Crawford

quote: For everything I do, I think about a 6-year-old girl and her mom that I saw at my concert last night. I think about what those two individuals would think if I were at a club last night. I never want to be arrested, and I never want to get a DUI, those are my moral values.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Being the only man in the household with my mom definitely helped me grow up fast.
author: LeBron James

quote: I think my mom threatened to put me up for adoption a few times.
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: My mom was very strict when I was growing up. I could not talk to boys until I was 18. I had to study and work hard.
author: Coco Lee

quote: I want somebody like my mom. My mom is a very charitable woman. She's the sweetest woman in the world. I'm looking for the second sweetest woman in the world. I'm looking for honesty and a big heart.
author: Jason Derulo

quote: My relationship with my mom is really the single most profound relationship that I've ever had in my life.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: My mom was always saying: 'Be whatever you want to be, but stick with it. Don't waver. Don't change who you are for anybody.'
author: Miranda Lambert

quote: My mom was a diabetic. Her sister was a diabetic, so I was already a candidate.
author: Angie Stone

quote: You don't realize how hard it is to live on your own. But there's no mom to do your laundry, and make you dinner and to do things for you, and you don't think about little things like buying paper towels and salt.
author: Emma Roberts

quote: When I was 19 years old, both of my parents died in the same year; my mom of cancer and my dad in a car accident. Through the next two or three years and a series of bad decisions - all my own, I might add - I ended up literally homeless, before that was even a word. I even slept occasionally under a pier on the Gulf Coast.
author: Andy Andrews

quote: My mom used to tell me that the most valuable thing she owned was her library card. We were poor, but that's not what she was talking about. My mom knew that education opened doors and opened minds.
author: Richard Carmona

quote: My father moved to Hawaii from Brooklyn and my mother came there as a child from the Philippines. They met at a show where my dad was playing percussion. My mom was a hula dancer.
author: Bruno Mars

quote: I like to work. The self-esteem and satisfaction that I get from working makes me a better person, which makes me a better mom.
author: Cindy Crawford

quote: My mom always said, 'Marry someone smarter than yourself, Katee, because No. 1, you're not that smart. And No. 2, then you'll have smart babies.'
author: Katee Sackhoff

quote: My mom is just so good with fashion! She always tells me what looks good, what doesn't look good, and she gives me great advice.
author: G. Hannelius

quote: I love babies, and I have my nephews that I love. I have a great mom and she has raised three kids, so if I take lessons from her, I think I'll be great. All my friends have little brothers or sisters.
author: Jamie Lynn Spears

quote: There was the time I bought three cars in the span of three or four weeks. It was crazy; it wasn't greedy. It was mine, my girl's, my mom's. I got Benzes for my ladies. But I felt crazy. You have to understand I come from a world where we're very modest. But that's not greedy. That's nice, right?
author: J. Cole

quote: Whenever something went wrong when I was young - if I had a pimple or if my hair broke - my mom would say, 'Sister mine, I'm going to make you some soup.' And I really thought the soup would make my pimple go away or my hair stronger.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I always speak so highly of my mom because she's my partner in crime, and none of this would be possible without her love and support. Always have to make time for Mom.
author: Shemar Moore

quote: For some people, home is family and their mom's house or their girl or whatever, and I have those experiences as well, but the biggest thing for me is Chicago.
author: Patrick Stump

quote: My mom often tells me to get married, but she gets it now that I don't want to. Like any other mom, she is worried, but she also understands the demands of my profession. I am blessed to have a family like this.
author: Randeep Hooda

quote: I wanted to get into films, and my parents were against it. I convinced my mom, and finally she convinced my dad. My dad then felt, who best to launch his son than him? So he launched me, and here I am.
author: Vijay

quote: My father was a soldier. He was a frogman in the special forces in Denmark before I was born, and always the reality of that inspired me. My mom is very left-wing, classic socialist, and she always talked about the solders as almost crazy, violent, sick people, and I want to confront that because its very judgmental, and I'm not sure it's true.
author: Tobias Lindholm

quote: I've never lived my life in the opinion of others. I believe I'm a good person. I believe I'm a good mom. But that's for my kids to decide, not for the world.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: My mom told me if I ever got a tattoo, she was going to take it off with a potato peeler.
author: Jacob Dalton

quote: As others have recently suggested, the term 'gamer' is no longer useful as an identity because games are for everyone. These days, even my mom spends an inordinate amount of time gaming on her iPad. So I'll take a cue from my younger self and say I don't care about being a 'gamer,' but I sure do love video games.
author: Anita Sarkeesian

quote: My mom loved rock n' roll. My father hated it. We couldn't play it when he was around. He liked classical music and Duke Ellington.
author: Patti Smith

quote: I'm the only one in - of my siblings, my mom and my family - that hasn't been affected by Lyme disease. It's been really hard for me because I'm the only one that doesn't really understand it.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: What I'm interested in is how your career choices can affect your private life, romantically or with your mom, your relatives, your friends, your hometown, and how media manipulates information - not newspapers or blogs, but the magazines that people impulse-buy that tell you what's hot and who's not.
author: Xavier Dolan

quote: My dad and my mom convinced me to go into biomedical engineering because they said astronauts going to Mars will need life support systems.
author: Rony Abovitz

quote: My mom is awesome. She's really young. My mom is 40, and she raised me listening to Nirvana and Courtney Love and Coldplay, Gin Blossoms, The Cranberries, and stuff. Like, my early, early memories are of being a little kid running around in floral skirts and Doc Martens when I was, like, three.
author: Halsey

quote: You've got to know how to hustle. I got a lot of inspiration from my parents. My father was definitely a hustler. With six kids in the house, you always got to be hustling. And my mom, she's got sick work ethic.
author: Jay Pharoah

quote: I'm very boring. I'm a mom. I'm 34 years old.
author: Britney Spears

quote: My mom and my dad was the best example of unconditional love I could see as a kid. I've known it my whole life. Interactions, kissing, hugging - it definitely wasn't the fake love.
author: BJ the Chicago Kid

quote: My mom thought I could dance because I used to dance to this Janet Jackson song she'd play when I was a baby. Then she would take me to a Saturday dance school. I used to go every week and got spotted by a scout, who suggested I audition for the role of Billy in 'Billy Elliot the Musical.'
author: Tom Holland

quote: Mom spent the time that she was supposed to be a kid actully raising children, her younger brother and younger sister. She was tough as nails and did not suffer fools at all. And the truth was she could not afford to. She spoke the truth, bluntly, directly, and without much varnish. I am her son.
author: Chris Christie

quote: I'm sure there were times when I wish I had thought, 'Gosh, that might really embarrass mom and dad,' but our parents didn't raise us to think about them. They're very selfless and they wanted us to have as normal of a college life as possible. So really, we didn't think of any repercussions.
author: Jenna Bush

quote: My mom and my dad wanted my brother and I to have a better life, you know, better education, better jobs. It was probably harder, much, much harder, for my parents. When you're a kid, you can learn a language much more easily; I learned English in less than a year.
author: Mila Kunis

quote: Being a mom makes me feel whole and like I understand the meaning of life.
author: Rebecca Romijn

quote: I love getting my nails done. My mom's best friend is a manicurist. When I was little, she'd do little paintings on my nails, like flowers.
author: Miranda Cosgrove

quote: My mom says: 'Why aren't you a doctor?' and I'm like, 'I am a doctor!' and she's all, 'No, I mean a real doctor.' She reads my books, but she says they give her a headache.
author: Brian Greene

quote: As a mom, you worry about protecting your kid. But there are extra added layers of fears when you're talking about a kid with autism or who has some special needs issue.
author: Holly Robinson Peete

quote: You need your mom and dad to protect you. It means they love you so much.
author: Gabby Douglas

quote: Work used to be the No. 1 important thing to me. Everything revolved around it, and to have a new perspective and have something else, my family, not just being a mom but being a part of an incredible family of my own, it makes me have a different perspective on life that I think is richer.
author: Lindsay Price

quote: I think 'Actions speak louder than words' is one thing, I think, I always took from my mom. And to this day, I think about that in everything I do.
author: Ginni Rometty

quote: Boxing is individual, although there's a team concept because you need a great corner, you need a great trainer, you need a great prep man, you need all of these things, but it's more of a Mano a Mano; it's more you versus me. I miss that time in training camp and Dad and Mom cooking meals. It was one big family.
author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quote: My mom broke the mold. She put my brother and I first, always, and worked her fingers to the bone trying to provide for us. She taught us right from wrong and gave us very strong morals and values and belief in family, things that have stayed with me.
author: Tim Howard

quote: When I eat, I have to chop up everything on the plate and stir it all together. It devastates my mom. Everyone at the table is like, 'That looks like cat vomit.' And I stir my Coke with a spoon until it's flat.
author: Margot Robbie

quote: I think the reason I'm a writer is because first, I was a reader. I loved to read. I read a lot of adventure stories and mystery books, and I have wonderful memories of my mom reading picture books aloud to me. I learned that words are powerful.
author: Andrew Clements

quote: My earliest memory is my mom picking me up after I had fallen down, giving me a big hug and reading me 'Goodnight Moon.' From that moment, to this one, every single memory I have of my mom is that regardless of what was happening in her life, she was always, always there for me.
author: Chelsea Clinton

quote: My mom got 11 kids. We struggled.
author: Young Thug

quote: My mom always taught me - you know, little boys listen to their moms too much - that whatever you put into something is what you're going to get out of it.
author: Jay-Z

quote: My jewelry's all fake - from Claire's. Or I get it from my mom's boutique in Barbados.
author: Rihanna

quote: Definitely there are lots of days that l am really tired, especially after becoming a new mom. There's nothing more exhausting because physically, mentally, emotionally, it requires you to be on all the time.
author: Jenna Dewan

quote: I did my first professional play at 11, and there was really nothing else I ever dreamed of doing. I felt so fortunate that I knew at the age of like, 12, like this is all I want to do for the rest of my life; that's the only play. There's no backup plan. My mom wanted me to go to school and have a backup plan. I'm like 'No, this is the only plan.'
author: Eric Johnson

quote: My mom had early rap records, like Jimmy Spicer. In the middle of the records was a turntable and a receiver - I used to scratch records on it - and on top was a reel-to-reel. In front of that wall were more stacks of records. It was either Mom's record or Pop's record, and they had their names on each and every one.
author: Jay-Z

quote: I fell in love with stories watching a British television puppet show called 'Thunderbirds' when it first came out on TV, about 1965, so I would have been 4 or 5 years old. I went out into the garden at my mom and dad's house, and I used to play with my little dinky toys, little cars and trucks and things.
author: Peter Jackson

quote: At the end of the day, I'm Violet's mom, and I want the best for her.
author: Christina Milian

quote: Violet speaks Spanish and understands it. She loves Cuban food! My mom is very good at teaching her about our culture, whether it be the food or Spanish or explaining to her that she's Cuban.
author: Christina Milian

quote: My mom always told me I could do or be anything I dared to dream, and I always wanted to work in the movie industry.
author: Octavia Spencer

quote: The first thing I do when I'm shopping is touch everything to see if it's itchy. I remember my mom used to put me in the itchiest clothes ever, and I was traumatized by it, so I won't wear anything itchy now.
author: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: When I was 15, my mom and I packed everything up and moved to Nashville so I could pursue my dream in music.
author: Kelsea Ballerini

quote: My parents told me from the time I can remember that, 'Yeah, you're adopted. But this is your family.' I can remember my mom, she tells me this story: when I was little, I was looking at her, and I was like, 'Why isn't my skin the same color as yours?' She was like, 'Oh, you're adopted, but I wish I had pretty brown skin like you.'
author: Colin Kaepernick

quote: Once you're a mom, always a mom. It's like riding a bike, you never forget.
author: Taraji P. Henson

quote: Statistics are to baseball what a flaky crust is to Mom's apple pie.
author: Harry Reasoner

quote: I think it's a tough road if you're a stay-at-home mom, a working mom, if you have a partner, if you don't. It's the best job in the world, and the toughest job in the world all at the same time.
author: Angela Kinsey

quote: I want to thank my mom, Brenda Rose. My heart, the reason I play the way I play, just everything. Just knowing the days I don't feel right, going to practice, having a hard time, I think about her when she had to wake me up, go to work and make sure I was all right. Those were hard days.
author: Derrick Rose

quote: My mom was a free spirit, and she brought me up to be a free spirit.
author: Mark Bradford

quote: My parents couldn't give me a whole lot of financial support, but they gave me good genes. My dad is a handsome son-of-a-gun, and my mom is beautiful. And I've definitely been the lucky recipient. So, thank you, Mom and Dad.
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: My guess is my brother would call his mom and his dad pretty regularly, a lot more than I probably did.
author: Jeb Bush

quote: My mom used to call me a parrot, because the way I spoke would change in every country we'd go to.
author: Hannah Simone

quote: I feel like a good mom. I'm a strong woman now... Don't look down on me. Pray for me because I'm trying.
author: Fantasia Barrino

quote: Every man must define his identity against his mother. If he does not, he just falls back into her and is swallowed up.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: I'm trying hard to keep my Australian accent. My mom would disown me if I didn't.
author: Maia Mitchell

quote: Who in their infinite wisdom decreed that Little League uniforms be white? Certainly not a mother.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: I remember my mom threatening me, half-serious: 'You know what? I should take you to Pittsburgh and put you in dance lessons just to keep you occupied.' Well, that brought everything to a screeching halt. 'Jeeze, dance lessons.' In retrospect, it would have been awesome, but then, 'Ugh, dancing - dancing's for sissies.'
author: Michael Keaton

quote: For the first few years of my life my mom used to cut my hair so there were a lot of bowl-cut hair styles.
author: Ne-Yo

quote: One-year-olds learn concealment. Five-year-olds lie outright: they manipulate via flattery. Nine-year-olds - masters of the cover-up. By the time you enter college, you're going to lie to your mom in one out of every five interactions.
author: Pamela Meyer

quote: Minimalism? It is something I appreciate as an art form but leave to others - unless you count a collection of warhorse-workwear Yves Saint Laurent trouser suits. Maybe my penchant for hippie-deluxe eccentricity came from an escapist dream of a different world. It was tough being a working mom in the 1970s.
author: Suzy Menkes

quote: My mom has always wished me a daughter just like me.
author: Pink

quote: Mothers are fonder than fathers of their children because they are more certain they are their own.
author: Aristotle

quote: Toronto is a special city, and the environment is perfect for the arts; free and alive. I'm a New Yorker, and Toronto reminds me of a much cleaner New York, so it's like coming home after your mom just cleaned your room for you; for me that's a lovely environment.
author: Emory Cohen

quote: My mom didn't want us to go to the candy house, she didn't want us to go to the ice cream truck, she didn't want us to go to the... There was actually a donut truck, if that makes sense.
author: Venus Williams

quote: The mother-child relationship is paradoxical and, in a sense, tragic. It requires the most intense love on the mother's side, yet this very love must help the child grow away from the mother, and to become fully independent.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: When I get high anxiety, I vomit. My mom was so stressed out. Then I found out I was staying in John Mayer's old dorm room, and I had a nice roommate. That completely brought me down. I was completely comfortable at Berklee.
author: Charlie Puth

quote: Motherhood has a very humanizing effect. Everything gets reduced to essentials.
author: Meryl Streep

quote: The fastest way to break the cycle of perfectionism and become a fearless mother is to give up the idea of doing it perfectly - indeed to embrace uncertainty and imperfection.
author: Arianna Huffington

quote: Motherhood is priced Of God, at price no man may dare To lessen or misunderstand.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Dad's Jewish and Irish, Mom's German and Scotch. I couldn't say I was anything. My last name isn't even Downey. My dad changed his name when he wanted to get into the Army and was underage. My real name is Robert Elias. I feel like I'm still looking for a home in some way.
author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quote: My mom, she wasn't like a baseball mother who knew everything about the game. She just wanted me to be happy with what I was doing.
author: David Ortiz

quote: What makes me happy is just curling up in with my mom in her bed and watching a marathon of 'CSI' and 'Grey's Anatomy' episodes with pints of ice cream.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: A lot of times when people become successful, people don't really understand what they had to do or the sacrifices they made to do that, or they assume that they had money. This is coming from, like, a kid who was broke and lived with roaches and a single mom in Dorchester.
author: Clinton Sparks

quote: A father may turn his back on his child, brothers and sisters may become inveterate enemies, husbands may desert their wives, wives their husbands. But a mother's love endures through all.
author: Washington Irving

quote: Sunscreen is my number 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 tip. I'm a fanatic, partially because I live in L.A. and have fair skin and freckles, and partially because of my kids. My mom always made me wear sunscreen and I'm trying to be that mom for them.
author: Alison Sweeney

quote: My mom didn't ever think I would take to acting because I was a very shy, very reserved kind of child. But obviously, something changed!
author: Abigail Breslin

quote: The best part about playing a mom is that people hug moms. I get hugs all the time. It really makes hard days a lot easier, and easy days are downright joyous.
author: Kim Rhodes

quote: If I could get any animal it would be a dolphin. I want one so bad. Me and my mom went swimming with dolphins and I was like, 'How do we get one of those?' and she was like, 'You can't get a dolphin. What are you gonna do, like, put it in your pool?'
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: When I was 7, an old lady was driving too fast in my neighborhood and hit me with her car. I was running out of the house, and when I got halfway into the street, my mom saw the car and yelled for me to run back. As I turned around the car hit me, dragged me five houses down the road, and I fractured my collarbone.
author: Rutina Wesley

quote: When I was a kid and my mom made tomato soup, she would cut buttered toast into squares and float them on top of each bowl.
author: Tom Douglas

quote: Mom always told us to wear pretty, matching underwear.
author: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: My mom started smoking when she was 11. She went to the hill next door to try her first cigarette. She set the entire hill on fire, but it didn't deter her.
author: Loni Anderson

quote: My mom was a terrible parent of young children. And thank God - I thank God every time I think of it - I was sent to my paternal grandmother. Ah, but my mother was a great parent of a young adult.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: What motivated me? My mother. My mother was an immigrant woman, a peasant woman, struggled all her life, worked in the garment center.
author: Al Lewis

quote: I hear my friends and my mom tell me I'm special, but honestly, I still don't get it.
author: LeBron James

quote: It's about getting the kids up and fed, getting one to school, getting the other down for a nap, going to the grocery store, picking one up from school, getting the other one down for another nap, cooking dinner... I live my life at these two extremes. I'm either a full-time stay-at-home mom or a full-time actress.
author: Jennifer Garner

quote: My mom used to take me down to the Jersey Shore when I was 7, 8, 9 years old. I can remember being down in that area - Belmar, Seaside Heights, Asbury Park and all those places that I went back and revisited.
author: David Cassidy

quote: My mom was concerned that us four little black girls have a really well-balanced life. She wanted us to be around people like us, but we also went to private school and traveled all the time. Now I fit in most places because I've been most places.
author: Kelis

quote: My mom, she's a great cook. You know, pirogue, borscht. I love borscht, and I love Pilemeni, meat dumplings.
author: Irina Shayk

quote: Mom and Pop were just a couple of kids when they got married. He was eighteen, she was sixteen and I was three.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: My mom was sarcastic about men. She would tell me Adam was the rough draft and Eve was the final product. She was a feminist minister, an earth mom who wore a bra only on Sundays.
author: Daphne Zuniga

quote: I grabbed my mom and I went to the couch and I said, 'Mom I want to ask Jesus to come into my heart.' And I got on my knee and I asked Jesus to come into my heart, forgive me of my sins, and make me a child of God.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: Our parents are obviously proud, but they're still trying to get used to the fact that we're in a band. I have a feeling my mom would actually like One Direction if I wasn't in it!
author: Zayn Malik

quote: I'm kind of lucky that we've finished shooting 'Cougar Town,' so I'm able to kind of just enjoy my pregnancy and be a stay-at-home mom and go to prenatal Pilates and do all that fun stuff that, if I were working, would be almost impossible to do.
author: Busy Philipps

quote: Did Superman really want to save the world, or did he just feel like he had to? Would he much rather be a farmer? Maybe. Would he much rather be hanging out with his dad and his mom and his dog? Probably.
author: Gerard Way

quote: I'm too young to have kids, but I really want to be a mom. I don't know if it's a Latin thing, but I love kids.
author: Alice Braga

quote: I'm raised by a single mom and didn't have pops around for the most part of my life. And she, by any means necessary, gave me the best opportunities that she knew how to give me.
author: Shemar Moore

quote: My mother wouldn't allow me to speak slang when I was growing up. But when I got outside, around my friends, it was 'Yo' and 'That's the joint' and 'Yo, what's up?' So I had my game for my friends and my game for my mom.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: It was tough being a single mom. It was tough being in a divorce with children. Very, very hard.
author: Melissa Etheridge

quote: What I will not do is continue to perpetuate stereotypes. I'm the daughter of a maid why do I have to also play a maid? My mom was a maid so I didn't have to be a maid.
author: Gina Rodriguez

quote: I'm not sure how young kids get to the point where they're memorizing and knowing songs, but I knew the words to 'Missing You' from John Waite probably from when I was three years old. For whatever reason, that was the song that I gravitated toward when it was on the radio and I was driving around with my mom.
author: Brandon Flowers

quote: I lead by example. My kids know what sweat is. They've seen me come home from so many runs and asked, 'What's on your skin? How did you get it?' And I tell them, 'It's from exercise!' So now my son will come home from a bike ride, take off his helmet and say, 'Look, Mom. I'm sweating! I just worked out!'
author: Summer Sanders

quote: Privacy is relational. It depends on the audience. You don't want your employer to know you're job hunting. You don't spill all about your love life to your mom or your kids. You don't tell trade secrets to your rivals.
author: Barton Gellman

quote: My mom has a rare talent for being able to open up the refrigerator, and with the peas, the leftover eggs, the cream, the spinach, the cheese, and a little rice, she can just whip up incredible risotto.
author: Cote de Pablo

quote: When my first semester grades came out, my mom and dad told me I wouldn't be playing football.
author: Joe Biden

quote: I think I grew up with a profound sense of watching people who were good people, who were smart people, who were hardworking people - God, nobody on this Earth worked harder than my mom and dad - and they had very little.
author: Elizabeth Warren

quote: I like a bohemian floral dress, but then I'll throw on a leather jacket or a pair of lace-up boots to give it an edge. My mom is always trying to get me to wear really sweet clothes. Something pink. But that's not really my look.
author: Margaret Qualley

quote: My mom is a wonderful woman. She's always been an inspiration to me, but having kids helped me make even more sense of my relationship with her.
author: Britney Spears

quote: My grandparents and my mom prayed the rosary a lot, and later in life, I had a priest friend of mine teach me centering prayer, based on Father Thomas Keating's work. That led to practicing different kinds of meditation off and on as I got older.
author: Tim Ryan

quote: I'm always awoken with the joyous sound and laughter of my son. That's the best part about being a mom.
author: Jane Krakowski

quote: On Halloween, don't you know back when you were little, your mom tells you don't eat any candy until she checks it? I used to be so tempted to eat my candy on the way to other people's houses. That used to be such a tease.
author: Derrick Rose

quote: My mom said the only reason men are alive is for lawn care and vehicle maintenance.
author: Tim Allen

quote: I wasn't one to go out and buy a new car and stereo system and expensive clothes. My mom helped keep me grounded.
author: Christina Applegate

quote: I come from a family of working professionals: my dad is a chartered accountant, and my mom is a professor.
author: Kriti Sanon

quote: I may be the only mother in America who knows exactly what their child is up to all the time.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: Why do grandparents and grandchildren get along so well? The mother.
author: Claudette Colbert

quote: There are only two things a child will share willingly communicable diseases and its mother's age.
author: Benjamin Spock

quote: Motherhood is the strangest thing, it can be like being one's own Trojan horse.
author: Rebecca West

quote: I basically became a cheerleader because I had a very strict mom. That was my way of being a bad girl.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: I sing seriously to my mom on the phone. To put her to sleep, I have to sing 'Maria' from West Side Story. When I hear her snoring, I hang up.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: I'd lose my mind if I heard my kid call the nanny Mommy.
author: Toni Braxton

quote: Mommy smoked but she didn't want us to. She saw smoke coming out of the barn one time, so we got whipped.
author: Loretta Lynn

quote: What do girls do who haven't any mothers to help them through their troubles?
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: My mom taught us the Serenity Prayer at a young age.
author: Toby Keith

quote: I don't want to let my life as a woman pass me by. There's a time to work, there's a time to be young and crazy, and there should be a time to enjoy motherhood. I'm actually looking forward to that.
author: Diane Kruger

quote: I always knew I wanted to have children. When I met my husband, Rande, I thought, 'This is the guy.' When you are getting ready to become a mom, being in love with someone just isn't enough. You need to think about whether he would be a good parent and raise your children with similar beliefs.
author: Cindy Crawford

quote: Postpartum depression is a very real and very serious problem for many mothers. It can happen to a first time mom or a veteran mother. It can occur a few days... or a few months after childbirth.
author: Richard J. Codey

quote: I consider my mom and all my sisters my friends.
author: Alexa Vega

quote: I'm a just a mom when I walk down the street.
author: Alice Barrett

quote: In fact, my mom always told me because I was the daughter of an Army officer born overseas in Paris, France, that under the Constitution she believed that I could never run for president.
author: Karen Hughes

quote: I love playing moms. It's a lot easier than being a mom, I hear.
author: Faith Ford

quote: She hits me and she beats me and she drinks. My mom is an alcoholic.
author: Tonya Harding

quote: I probably have an earlier curfew than anyone. My mom wants to keep me really safe and my dad's not overly protective, but he's a dad no matter what.
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: My mom used to make everything. She had a great garden and composted and made everything from scratch - peanut butter, bread, jelly, everything. I don't know how she did it because all those things take time and love and labour. I only do half the stuff she does - but there's still time.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: My mother was a single mom, and most of the women I know are strong.
author: Regina King

quote: Even in high school, I'd tell my mom I was sick of swimming and wanted to try to play golf. She wasn't too happy. She'd say, 'Think about this.' And I'd always end up getting back in the pool.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: My mom still lives in Denver and some of my brothers are still in the area, so I still have strong ties there.
author: Terrell Davis

quote: I grew up painting and playing piano so when I was a little kid I thought I was going to be an artist or a painter but my mom had me taking piano lessons for about 10-12 years as a young kid.
author: Mike Shinoda

quote: In third grade, I was taking tap-dance lessons, and about six weeks before the recital I wanted to quit. My mom said, 'No, you're going to stay with it.' Well, I did it, and I was bad, too! But my parents never let their kids walk away from something because it was too hard.
author: Rebecca Lobo

quote: As a mom I know that raising children is the hardest job there is.
author: Hilary Rosen

quote: When I see my mom in the stands, it always pushes me to succeed.
author: Ashton Eaton

quote: My whole life sort of ended when my mom died.
author: Cheryl Strayed

quote: Country was about character. Country's changed because of monsters like Clear Channel who bought up all the stations and sliced them up into formats. Our demographic is now the soccer mom.
author: Gary Allan

quote: My mom was such a strong character. I don't want to say she was like a man, but she was tough.
author: Lance Armstrong

quote: I'm more straightforward, and I speak up more than I did before. When I was younger, I wouldn't speak up as much, but now that I'm a mom, things have changed.
author: Britney Spears

quote: My mom knows pretty well how I see her.
author: Lena Dunham

quote: Two weeks ago at the U.S. Amateur, my mom caddied, and that is kind of a different feeling, because she's your mom and you have to listen to her. It was really comfortable having my mom there, but it's also really relieving and comfortable to have someone that knows the course off their hat, really.
author: Lydia Ko

quote: Being a singer is all about me. About ego. Being a mom is all about being selfless - two different worlds.
author: Gwen Stefani

quote: My mom insisted on multigrain bread and never allowed soda in the house.
author: Vin Diesel

quote: One of my most sentimental items is my grandmother's engagement ring that my mom gave me a few years ago. It's a Victorian-style setting that's closed in the back, so it doesn't sparkle the way diamonds do now. I wear it as a pendant.
author: Georgina Chapman

quote: My mom calls me an older soul because, growing up, she taught me stuff real early. Now I spend most of my time chasing wisdom, chasing understanding.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: When my dad was badly weakened by the flu and my mom wanted to call an ambulance to take him to the emergency room, he wouldn't go unless he could shave first and change into a nice shirt and a pair of slacks.
author: Rich Lowry

quote: When I turned 18, my mom, my nana and I all went and had tattoos of our favorite Bible verses put on the inside of our wrists. Mine is 1st Timothy, 4:12.
author: Jordin Sparks

quote: I think my first big purchase was actually for my mom. She had one of those '90s TVs in her living room that's like a 10x10 brick, so I purchased her a flatscreen for her living room.
author: Dave Franco

quote: My mom told me to do whatever I wanted to do and don't get too anxious about it.
author: David Giuntoli

quote: For many women, going back to work a few months after having a baby is overwhelming and unmanageable. As strange as it may seem, things get even more difficult for a working mom after the second and third baby arrive. By that time, the romance of being a modern 'superwoman' wears off and reality sets in.
author: Mika Brzezinski

quote: I am a single mom and I'm the breadwinner and I have to work and I have to do these things and that's just the way it is. I don't think my son even knows any different.
author: Charisma Carpenter

quote: Aretha Franklin was a teenage mom, a musician who came from an incredibly Christian background, but there was a lot of love, which is really inspiring in a feminist way.
author: Beth Ditto

quote: I can't help but recall my dad and mom. Depression era kids, 8th and 9th grade educations, clawed and scratched to make a living as dairy farmers their whole life. At least two drought cycles nearly took it all away. They just worked harder, longer... and they made it.
author: Bob Beauprez

quote: My parents waited to have me and my sister - my dad was 43 when my mother had me, and my mom was 38. They purposefully waited until they had had their adventures in life so that we wouldn't represent the end of their freedom.
author: Christian Borle

quote: My mom worked as a pharmacist, but she is one of the best storytellers I know. My sister is a gospel and opera singer and my brother, who passed away, was a writer.
author: Tunde Adebimpe

quote: My deceased grandmother on my mom's side was a real fairy godmother, who lived to be 102 and who I always feel is looking after me.
author: Victoria Clark

quote: I was brought up bilingual, but there came a point where my mom went back to work and I got a white babysitter, so sadly I lost it. Now I can understand Spanish and put words together, but I don't speak it fluently. I'm ashamed of that.
author: Michael Trevino

quote: It's tough growing up where I grew up. My family is very small and really tight. Just being around the neighborhood, my brothers were always around. I didn't want to be in any trouble because I knew my mom or brothers would find out. I didn't want to hurt their feelings. I just tried to do everything right.
author: Derrick Rose

quote: You may earn whatever money you earn as a cricketer, but you want to play for your country. At the end of the day, you want to do something special. There are plenty of people who earn 50 crores or 100 crores as businessmen or big professionals or who are really doing well in business. But what gives pleasure to your mom and dad is the fame.
author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quote: As an actress, I have put myself out there as an independent black woman, a single mom, a go-getter, a hustler who isn't afraid to survive.
author: LisaRaye McCoy-Misick

quote: I don't remember my first trip, but I do remember when my mom took me to Disney World in Orlando. It wasn't the rides but Epcot Center that most fascinated me. It made me want to see those countries that are represented there for real.
author: Lisa Ling

quote: My mom was in education, and I remember reading in one of her books about multiple intelligences - this whole theory about how there are all these different ways you can be intelligent, like eight or 10 of them or something. And one of them is emotional.
author: Lynn Shelton

quote: Before 'Lucky Louie,' nobody would ever cast me to play a mom or a wife; nobody ever saw me in that role, which is weird, since that's who I really am.
author: Pamela Adlon

quote: One day I went up to my mom and I said, 'Mom, can I have permission to build a 2.3-million electron-volt atom smasher - a betatron - in the garage?' And my mom stared at me, and she said, 'Sure. Why not? And don't forget to take out the garbage.'
author: Michio Kaku

quote: My mom and dad were actors when they were younger and had a horrible experience of it. My dad became a literary agent and my mom a casting director.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: My dad didn't graduate from high school, ended up being a printing salesman, probably never made more than $8,000 a year. My mom sold real estate and did it part time.
author: Al Franken

quote: Bakers get excited over aprons. I love the soft cotton ones with pockets like my gramma and mom wore. They always kept a hankie tucked in one pocket, which wasn't sanitary, but was comforting to the child who needed a tear or nose wiped.
author: Regina Brett

quote: I remember one time when all the nuns in my Catholic grade school got around in a semicircle, me and Mom in the middle, and they said, 'Mrs. Farley, the children at school are laughing at Christopher, not with him.' I thought, 'Who cares? As long as they're laughing.'
author: Chris Farley

quote: I knew that I was a gay boy fairly early; what was interesting to me was that my mother didn't know. She made me play baseball - I had no desire to do that. I said, 'Mom, I don't like direct sunlight, I don't like bugs, I don't like grass, and I'd rather be in the house playing with your fabric samples.'
author: Nate Berkus

quote: My mom is a really good cook. We used to make dumplings together.
author: Jason Wu

quote: My mom means the world to me. She's always been the one to get me up early for work, help me with my make up and hair, and just be there to support me in whatever I do. She always makes sure that no matter what, I'm happy in what I'm doing.
author: Raini Rodriguez

quote: My mom really inspired me. She has always taught me it's not about us, it's about what we can give back.
author: Bailee Madison

quote: I've got three sisters, five aunties, and my mom. It must have had an influence on me growing up.
author: Zayn Malik

quote: I think maybe my mom thought that Katharine Hepburn would be a good role model of, like, a strong, smart, independent woman. Maybe she steered me in that direction. You know, because she was really so ahead of her time.
author: Gillian Jacobs

quote: When you can impress your mom by saying you've been to someone's concert, you know you're pretty lame.
author: Gillian Jacobs

quote: After I graduated high school and came out to do 'Buffy,' I was enrolled at my mom's university, and I was going to go get a real job. I never thought of acting and never really wanted to be an actor.
author: Eliza Dushku

quote: I don't have a creepy uncle, but I certainly have many, many uncles. My mom has twelve brothers and sisters, and my dad has two sisters and three brothers. Their maturity level is still hovering around fifteen when they all get together, but they're not necessarily creepy.
author: Martha MacIsaac

quote: You know, I only claim to play three instruments. My dad is a banker, but a drummer at heart; and my mom used to teach piano lessons when she was younger. So I can play some piano, play a little drums, and fake the bass - but banjo, mandolin, and guitar are my thing.
author: Charlie Worsham

quote: My mom has beautiful eyes, and I inherited a lot of her rituals, accentuating eyes.
author: Allison Williams

quote: My mother never said to lose weight. Diets were never a big deal. My mom was always beautiful and voluptuous and curvy, and I always thought she was gorgeous.
author: Christina Hendricks

quote: It's not about being rich, but everyone back home has a pool. And I was a total water baby. My mom couldn't get me out - she'd put my dinner plate at the end of the pool, and I'd eat my meals in the water.
author: Margot Robbie

quote: People may not know this about me, but I've always loved cooking. My favorite thing to cook is my mom's spicy spaghetti.
author: Becky G

quote: That's the Indian in me - you must put spices on everything. As a kid, whenever we got sick, my mom would take milk and put turmeric in it. That was our medicine. That was the cure-all. Some people turn to Robitussin.
author: Aasif Mandvi

quote: It's not like I'm out eating McDonald's and Del Taco every night. I eat good: my mom fixes dinner every single night - baked chicken, fish - she cooks a great meal every single night.
author: Bryce Harper

quote: I used to read music books when I was 13. My mom was working at a library. She's a librarian. I would get my mom to check out any kind of books that had anything to do with the music industry. I read a lot about royalities, publishing, marketing, stuff like that.
author: Juicy J

quote: My mom sent me money for a car, but the cops impounded it because I had no insurance.
author: Martin Henderson

quote: My mom always taught me to put toothpaste on pimples to dry them out at night. I do that all the time. I don't use anything fancy when I get a pimple. And I never use the same toothpaste for long because I get bored. So I'll do peppermint and then one month I'll do cinnamon. I'm creative.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: When I come to visit my mom - every two or three months - I generally spend five or six hours with her each day. She's always immensely glad to see me, her eldest child, her only son.
author: Michael Dirda

quote: It's been a lot of fun getting to work with Tracy Middendorf, who plays my mom. As an actor, it's always fun to have different parents and to create different familial dynamics than you have in your real life.
author: Willa Fitzgerald

quote: You really don't need to study how to change a diaper. As a new mom, you learn pretty darn quickly!
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: I was raised vegan. My mom would always make quinoa with squash and kale, hippie stuff like that. Now I eat meat, but I try to be conscious about where it's coming from.
author: Zoe Kravitz

quote: My mom and I have always been very close since she did raise me as, like, a single mom. My friends and everyone I know are like, 'Wow, you guys really have a really good relationship.' She's with me a lot of the time, so people find that kind of shocking.
author: Tiffany Trump

quote: My mom's best friend growing up was diagnosed with AIDS, and he basically raised me when my mom was launching her business. Although I didn't understand at the time what HIV or AIDS was, I knew that's what he passed away from.
author: Solange Knowles

quote: When I was 13, I would come visit my aunt and uncle in New York. I decided I wanted to live with them after seeing my cousin's school. Honestly, I just wanted to go to a school where I didn't have to wear uniforms, and my mom said okay.
author: Priyanka Chopra

quote: Having children is not for everyone, but I think it's a beautiful lesson in it not being all about me anymore. It's a relief, in a way. It's like, this is her story now, and I'm her mom. It's a nice shift.
author: Lake Bell

quote: My mom is incredibly stylish, and she gets it from my grandmother. I feel like I can't live up to how chic they are as women. They are great role models for aging gracefully, and that's a thing that is very key that I try to always emulate.
author: Lake Bell

quote: My parents know I was outgoing as a child, and whenever people came over, I'd automatically do impressions of them as soon as they left; it was my mom's favorite thing. Yes, I grew up in Hollywood, but not in any rich neighborhood.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: My mom, Nellie, got me a rosary at church. I don't use it to pray before a competition. I'll just pray normally to myself, but I have it there in case.
author: Simone Biles

quote: I had a lot of energy, and my mom decided to look for a place where I can spend the energy, because I was jumping on the couch and furniture, and I was jumping on the top of the things in the house.
author: Nadia Comaneci

quote: At a show, I'll look out from the stage and see a woman with a pearl necklace next to a guy in a Grateful Dead T-shirt next to a young kid with his mom. It's fun to see them all together.
author: Hiromi Uehara

quote: It was the late '70s when my parents met. My dad was a lighting director for a soap opera, and my mom was a temp at the studio. They moved into a house in The Valley in L.A., to a neighborhood that was leafy and affordable.
author: Meghan Markle

quote: At the start of each week, I generally cook a box of quinoa, and while it's simmering, I saute onions, garlic and any veggies I have on hand in a separate pan. I season the vegetables with Spike, a seasoning blend my mom always used when I was growing up, or a little Bragg Liquid Aminos. I always add crushed red pepper and chopped fresh herbs.
author: Meghan Markle

quote: I'm like every waitress in every diner I'm like every mom driving her kids to school. I'm nothing special at all.
author: Katherine Dunn

quote: Dad told me that before I was born, he would put my mom's stomach up to the speaker and play Led Zeppelin.
author: Thomas Rhett

quote: I like superheroes who are very human and underdog. That's why I relate to my character in 'A Flying Jatt': because he is a very normal person and very human. He was very unsure about his super powers; he didn't know how to use them. He is scared of heights, speed. Especially he is scared of his mom, but he has to listen to her.
author: Tiger Shroff

quote: There was always an unspoken generosity about my mom.
author: Matt Lauer

quote: I didn't grow up with a lot of money, so my mom didn't have random money to buy me a car, and I didn't have money to have a car unless I worked, so I didn't get a car until I got my first job at 18.
author: Dominick Cruz

quote: My dad and mom were in bands: the Soda Jerks, Fat Time, Girls at Play - which is a play on Men at Work.
author: Sia

quote: My mom named me Pom because she said it sounded like a combination of Korean words that mean 'spring' and 'tiger.' So, it's very unique!
author: Pom Klementieff

quote: It was so weird that I would end up directing 'The Greatest Game Ever Played,' because, y'know, I'm not a big golfer myself. But I grew up around the game. My mom and dad kind of built their dream house off the 11th fairway of Shady Oaks Country Club in Fort Worth.
author: Bill Paxton

quote: Marvin Gaye is an inspiration to me. He was one of the first Motown musicians that my mom and dad introduced me to, and I always thought it would be a good idea if I was ever an artist, and now I am, to make a record called 'Marvin Gaye.'
author: Charlie Puth

quote: I didn't understand that I could sing until I was like 11 or 12. My mom heard me singing around the house and she said, What are you doing? You really can sing! So then I started going to school and singing to the girls.
author: Chris Brown

quote: My mom is going to kill me for talking about sleeping with people. But I don't want to put myself in the position where I'm in a monogamous relationship right now. I'm not dating just one person. 'Sex and the City' changed everything for me because those girls would sleep with so many people.
author: Lindsay Lohan

quote: I care so passionately about improving the quality of life for women and girls, not just here in the United States, but internationally as well. I am a single mom and I raised a daughter who is now a young adult.
author: Valerie Jarrett

quote: We were poor. But my mom never accepted that. She worked hard to become a residential contractor - got her master's with honors at the University of New Orleans. I used to go to every class with her. Her father was my paternal figure.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: There's been times when I've had heartbreaking moments and I'm like, 'I can't believe you said that,' or 'I can't believe you did that'. And it hurts, it still hurts, and it'll always hurt, but I've never had somebody that I truly cared about just walk out on me, whether it was a boyfriend, or an aunt, mom or dad.
author: Shailene Woodley

quote: My mom and dad passed away from cancer. Within nine months, I lost both of my folks. Immediately after that, I had a horrible betrayal where my brother, who worked for me, stole a lot of my money. He's in jail now.
author: Dane Cook

quote: Mom's dad was in the army, stormed the beach at Normandy, fought through the French hedgerows, the Battle of the Ardennes, the Battle of the Bulge, and liberated concentration camps at the end of the war.
author: Mark Hoppus

quote: I promised my mom that if, after a year of putting 150 percent into my career it didn't work out, I would go back to school. I never did go back.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: I warm up with my mom and make sure I understand what the songs are about and make sure I'm using the right technique. To be honest with you, I really don't practice a lot... Usually, I say a prayer and ask the Lord to sing with me and help me and stand on the stage with me.
author: Jackie Evancho

quote: My mom is big on moisturizer and water. She always reminds me to drink a lot of water and wear sunglasses because I always forget them when I go out, even though they are one of my favorite accessories. She always reminds me about wrinkles, and always did, so it's kind of been ingrained into me.
author: Brittany Snow

quote: People still ask my husband and me which of us is the mom - which, as one lesbian friend pointed out to me, is like asking which chopstick is the fork. This pressure on us to embody normative traditions can be paralysing.
author: Andrew Solomon

quote: I am so blessed. I have an incredible wife, children I adore; I'm a very happy man. I've got a great mom and dad and brothers and sisters and stuff, so I've always been happy. And I never stop smiling.
author: Michael Kelly

quote: I'm a real stay-at-home mom. I'm really hands-on. Everything else became secondary.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: I grew up in Marcy Projects in Brooklyn, and my mom and pop had an extensive record collection, so Michael Jackson and Stevie Wonder and all of those sounds and souls of Motown filled the house.
author: Jay-Z

quote: Having a mom as a hairdresser was really awesome: I was always her test dummy. I've had every style, every color you could imagine.
author: Alessia Cara

quote: I know a lot of people who really aren't beautiful because their attitudes are very nasty... Whether I make the 50 most beautiful list or not, I'm always going to feel like I'm number one most beautiful to myself... I get that from my mom, and my daddy and my friends who raised me.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: I read that John Hughes script for 'Mr. Mom,' and I thought, 'This guy is a funny writer.' I went: 'You ought to stick around and direct this thing.' But he didn't; he left, and look what he became. A really legendary comedy director.
author: Michael Keaton

quote: My mom had Julia Child and 'The Fannie Farmer Cookbook' on top of the refrigerator, and she had a small repertoire of French dishes.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: I've always wanted to be sure my parents approve of what I do. Even with my tattoos, my mom went with me.
author: Ashley Tisdale

quote: My mom and my dad were both very sociable, meeting lots of interesting people.
author: Bill Gates

quote: My mom was on the United Way group that decides how to allocate the money and looks at all the different charities and makes the very hard decisions about where that pool of funds is going to go.
author: Bill Gates

quote: My dad died when I was young; my mom remarried with more haste than sense to a fellow... he wasn't evil or anything, but he was worthless.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I'm too tough and sensitive to have to have some pubescent twerp with his mom's earring in his tongue, who combs his hair with Redi-Whip and has an Ani DiFranco tattoo on his shin, come show me how a computer works.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I just wasn't cut out to be a Chinese Tiger Mom. I'm more of an Irish Setter Dad.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: When my mom ran for the Senate, my dad was there for her every step of the way. I can still hear her saying in her beautiful voice, 'Why should women have any less say than men, about the great decisions facing our nation?'
author: Mitt Romney

quote: I love my dad. It's fair to say that I probably would not have thought of politics had I not seen my mom and dad involved in politics.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: My guess is that my mom and dad are very actively involved in the affairs of the next life, and they don't spend too much time looking back. My dad used to say he always looks forward; he never looks back.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: My mom and I have always been really close. She's always been the friend that was always there. There were times when, in middle school and junior high, I didn't have a lot of friends. But my mom was always my friend. Always.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: When I was younger we had a grape arbor, and my mom would go out and pick grapes and make grape jam in the sink - boil it, put it in jars, and give it away as gifts.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I've been my mom's kitchen helper since I was a little kid.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I once went on the most grueling radio tour. Living in hotel rooms, sleeping in the backs of rental cars as my mom drove to three different cities in one day.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: My question about luging is, How do you get into the luge community to begin with? Is it one day like, 'Mom, Dad, I really want to luge.' And your parents are like: 'O.K., I'll quit my job. We'll move to an Alpine community.'
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: My dad was a bartender. My mom was a cashier, a maid and a stock clerk at K-Mart. They never made it big. They were never rich. And yet they were successful. Because just a few decades removed from hopelessness, they made possible for us all the things that had been impossible for them.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: My parents were working class folks. My dad was a bartender for most of his life, my mom was a maid and a cashier and a stock clerk at WalMart. We were not people of financial means in terms of significant financial means. I always told them, 'I didn't always have what I wanted. I always had what I needed.' My parents always provided that.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: It wasn't so long ago that I was a working mom myself. And I know that sometimes, much as we all hate to admit it, it's just easier to park the kids in front of the TV for a few hours, so we can pay the bills or do the laundry or just have some peace and quiet for a change.
author: Michelle Obama
